title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct stakeholder interviews and research to understand the current processes and pain points in property title registration and transfer.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for a blockchain-based property title registration and transfer system, focusing on the following aspects: 1) Blockchain network (consensus mechanism, node types, and network topology), 2) Smart contracts (for title registration, transfer, and related processes), 3) Integration with existing land registry and real estate systems, secure and scalable data storage, and comprehensive security considerations (data encryption, access controls, and auditing). Also, include the following elements: interoperability and data exchange standards for seamless integration with external systems, scalability and performance requirements (transaction throughput and latency), disaster recovery and business continuity planning, user experience and interface design for different stakeholders (e.g., property owners, real estate agents, government agencies), compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards (e.g., data privacy, anti-money laundering). In addition, the design should also consider the following: 1) Implementing a modular and extendable architecture to accommodate future updates or integrations, 2) Exploring off-chain solutions for improving scalability and performance, 3) Ensuring the system's resilience against potential attacks (security best practices), 4) Providing clear documentation for each module of the system, including design decisions, technical specifications, and usage examples. If the RFC is ready for the next state, update the rfc_state field accordingly.

title: Blockchain Network Setup
description: Set up the blockchain network, including node configuration, consensus mechanism, and network security.

title: Smart Contract Development
description: Develop smart contracts for property title registration, transfer, and verification on the blockchain.

title: Database Design and Integration
description: Design the database schema for storing property and ownership information, and integrate it with the blockchain network.

title: User Interface Development
description: Develop the user interface for property owners, buyers, sellers, and other stakeholders to interact with the system.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans and perform thorough testing of the system, including functional, performance, and security testing.

title: Deployment and Integration
description: Deploy the system to a production environment and integrate it with existing systems and processes.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, and develop training materials for users and administrators.
